name: Piscirazzi
description:
If the game doesn't run too well in your browser try running it in Firefox or downloading the executable.


Welcome to Piscirazzi by reBTF
(pisci - related to fish, razzi - from paparazzi)

Made in just over a week for the Game Dev Network's Dragon Jam.

This is a game about taking photographs of fish in space.

You have 5 minutes to try to get the best photo you can.

Line up as many fish in your lens as you can and snap.

WASD or Arrow keys to move
Space, Z or N to take a photo
Left shift, X or M to harpoon (non lethal, just for fun)
Escape closes the game

Sometimes the best photo is found by waiting for the fish to come to you.
